allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Stop-Process -Id 34140 -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Sleep -Seconds 1; Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 5173 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object OwningProcess")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - CuisineControl HACCP PWA

Application de gestion HACCP pour la restauration avec design Apple.com.
React 19 + TypeScript + Vite + Tailwind CSS 4 + Dexie \(IndexedDB\).

Features: temperatures, tracabilite, taches, factures, export PDF/CSV.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

feat: add recipes, assistant, security, suppliers, smart alerts and tests

- Add recipe management with AI-powered suggestions and cost calculation

- Add oil change tracker for temperature module
- Add supplier mapping and management services
- Add smart alerts service
- Add backup/restore functionality
- Add OCR, recipe AI, and supplier tests
- Add e2e tests with Playwright
- Add CI workflow, icons, and documentation
- Update all existing components and services

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
